effect.diamond-pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.

short_effect.diamond-pearl: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
short_effect.platinum: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
short_effect.heartgold-soulsilver: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: This attack inflicts double damage on a paralyzed foe. It also cures the foe’s paralysis, however.
flavor_text.platinum: This attack inflicts double damage on a paralyzed foe. It also cures the foe’s paralysis, however.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: This attack inflicts double damage on a paralyzed foe. It also cures the foe’s paralysis, however.
